name: Dress To Play: Cute Witches!
synopsis: In Dress To Play: Cute Witches! Dress to play and play to dress! Make a little witch and design her outfit in the dressing room. When you finish, get ready to set off on an adventure as your character flies away on her broomstick to a peaceful world inhabited by fantasy characters. The more you play, the more rewards and gifts you'll receive. Youâ€™ll also earn more items of clothing to dress your little witches in! Features: 2 games in one: Create and dress up a little witch at your taste. Enjoy playing the adventure with your character. 50 challenges which will provide more than 50 new pieces to dress your characters. Thousands of combinations to create thousands of different little witches. An adventure full of cute creatures. A colorful and beautiful universe to enjoy with the 3D effect.
